main event: On October 6, 1962, Lt Col George R. Crowley and other military personnel observed a bright, luminous object in the sky near Naha AFB, Okinawa.
interesting points: The object changed shape and color slightly as it moved northward,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,During the observations, the sky was clear with good visibility,No sound was heard during the sightings,Multiple military personnel reported similar observations of the object.
witness description: military personnel, including an experienced pilot and airmen
